name: Side Effects Include
description:
Somebody mixed up the pharmaceuticals! 

It sure would be easy to figure out which ones cause which side effects if you could do something scientific.

Unfortunately, you're fresh out of time, and even fresher out of control groups!

You'll have to come up with a clever way to deduce the answers.
There's a short tutorial in game.

CONTROLS:
MOUSE - Click and Drag to interact with various things.
